[{"id":"36941f64-69f5-4750-bea4-6b104b84c33b","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Class Documentation: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"DefinitionManager","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"28525675-d6db-41a8-8889-bf4fabdcdeb1","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"DefinitionManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" acts as the central authority and repository for all ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Definition","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" objects in the Jarvis system. It manages the global symbol table, linking namespaces to their structural roles (variables, functions, classes) and their dynamic value states. By coordinating the relationships between scopes, aliases, and value-flow points, the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"DefinitionManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" allows the engine to resolve exactly what a symbol represents at any given point in a program's execution.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"de62d697-cec2-42b6-88b2-5927d773a8b4","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"7a5b35aa-54d6-4fca-aaf2-4998618b2579","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Attributes","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4239e6bb-a470-476a-bdbb-78965e488724","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"defs","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" instances.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1a2aa75c-d8e5-4ebb-9e35-7ed44111fe1d","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"copyMap","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" CRUD","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"cd33205c-6dcf-4006-971b-10c8d01cde1d","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"These methods provide the fundamental operations for the symbol table. They ensure that every code entity is uniquely registered and validated, preventing data corruption from accidental duplicate definitions.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4a53725c-e3ad-42e2-bd46-617cf5a729fd","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Key Methods","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"__init__","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"create","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"create_by_name","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"get","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"getOrCreate","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"get_defs","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"addCopy","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0a18bbc3-6030-43fc-b5ea-75c460a216ba","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Specialized Construct Handling","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9318c210-0b2e-4c88-b4c3-6cc8197b11a1","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"These high-level handlers manage the creation of complex program entities. For instance, when registering a function, the manager automatically initializes the necessary sub-structures, such as a dedicated return definition to track output flow.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8998313c-82bc-41f4-a1d6-2df647b406d7","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Key Methods","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"handle_function_def","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"handle_class_def","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"handle_if_def","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"dc48deca-52e0-4a54-9f98-a50a459a391e","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Scope & Value Resolution","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"89127075-0155-438f-843c-7c0140d3aa04","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This group contains the intelligence required to navigate the code's lexical hierarchy. These methods can determine which module owns a variable, check if two variables share the same functional scope, or recursively follow a chain of assignments to find the ultimate "terminal" source of a value.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"440976e0-f296-41c1-8860-bf9b79bcf8c3","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Key Methods","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"get_scope_name","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"get_module_name","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"is_same_scope","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"get_final_pointName","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"get_last_final_pointName","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"transform_defi","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"helper","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ab6bedb2-95bc-47f1-b3f4-1e0b356dcc73","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"bb6cbbba-b910-4063-bf3c-a9c961f9be77","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Usage Example","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2fac52f2-40ee-4f3e-b6a3-99b326f3f4f6","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"DefinitionManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is used by the core analyzer to maintain a consistent view of the program state as it traverses different files and functions.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"82118caf-b6be-48c9-a654-1016fb44c8db","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"import utils
from points import DefinitionManager

# 1. Setup the manager
dm = DefinitionManager()

# 2. Register a new function
# This automatically handles the namespace and the '.return' definition
func_defi = dm.handle_function_def("math_lib", "add")

# 3. resolve a deep namespace to its owning module
# Given 'math_lib.add.local_var', returns 'math_lib'
module_owner = dm.get_module_name("math_lib.add.local_var")

# 4. Deep resolution of a value chain
# If a = b and b = c, calling this on 'a' returns 'c'
final_targets = dm.get_last_final_pointName("math_lib.add.a")
print(f"Final resolution targets: {final_targets}")","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ddb8a96b-a5c8-4fdb-b618-be63ba9f9dc1","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Insights","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9eae39f5-098a-4afd-9d06-cf7d88554587","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Automatic Return Tracking","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"handle_function_def","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" method ensures that every function always has a dedicated ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":".return","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" namespace, which is crucial for inter-procedural data flow analysis.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1cff28bb-7c41-4f9b-9038-d16335df8e9d","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Recursive Tracing","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"get_last_final_pointName","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" method uses a queue-based approach to resolve assignment chains, ensuring that aliases and temporary variables don't stop the flow of analysis.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"79399c3d-ac5d-43c7-98b0-7c547bea227e","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Lexical Awareness","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": By walking the namespace hierarchy (using string manipulations on the dots), the manager can resolve scopes without needing expensive parent-link pointers for every single definition.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9f23b1a9-801a-410c-9fbd-908e1652aa81","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
